description: Awayuki Himeno is the sixteen-year-old heroine of Prétear. After her mother`s death and her father`s remarriage, Himeno is thrust into a high-class society life where she has trouble adjusting as she is picked on both by her new family and her peers at school. As Himeno`s alienation grows, she meets Hayate and the other Leafe Knights, who tell her that she`s the Prétear who is needed to save the world.
name: Awayuki Himeno
